content.detailedDescription: My friend was on the beach of dog island, florida (off shore from the coastal town of carrabelle).  it was a beautiful clear sunny afternoon with a normal ocean breeze.  he and his friend took several photos with a digital camera of the beach/ocean/sky, looking south over the gulf of mexico.  later when looking closely at the photos, he noticed a strange white hazy streak in the sky, which he thought was an optical anomoly.  then he also noticed a tiny object near the streak in the sky.  when zooming in on the object in the photo, it looks like a disk in the sky with the top shiney, apparently due to reflected sun light, and the bottom with a dark shadow.  they had not noticed either the streak or the object when taking the photos.  (see attached photo).  to find the object, zoom in and pan down to the right at an ~45 deg angle.
content.summary: My friend took a photo of the beach/ocean/sky and later noticed an object in the photo that looks like a disk in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I feel badly waiting this long to remember to come tell you about this.  i got a lot of flak and was ignored at the beginning of this but have had enough people witness these craft that i understand it is not necessary that it conform to anyone else's belief system.  after i figured that out life just kept rolling along and i lost track of telling someone who might believe somnething without a photo.

the first new mexico appearance of one of these craft was in may of 2007, when i lived in las cruces.  i have seen things here and there in the years before this happened but will tell you about those occuring here.

one night i was looking toward a very vivid sunset and saw a small golden orb north of the sun where it was setting.  i got my neighbor and her daughter to come to look as it appeared to be a comet coming straight at the earth.  i wondered why we weren't hearing about something like that on the news.  i went in that evening, not waiting until the end of sunset to see what would become of the object. i never did think to stay out but that proved to be okay as it happened.  

the orb was there again the next afternoon, obviously a little bigger and i got the neighbors again.  they again witnessed the craft and went back in.  i watched for a while and went back in.  

that craft appeared there for six afternoons in total, a little bigger each day.  on the sixth day it moved to the south until it was due west of me and still substantial in appearance.  it then began to recede into the distance and i watched until it was a very, very long way away where it made a series of three movement.  first it zipped to the left and up a little way.  then it zipped to the right and up, very near to above the point where it began the series.  the third move was to the left and up again, this time very, very rapidly moving into the distance and out of sight.  

soon after that i moved to deming, 60 miles west of las cruces.  that summer i saw two craft but thought they were satellites at the time.  

then on october 11, 2008 i went out to give a neighbor's dog a treat.  the dog took the treat but kept his eyes looking up past my head.  it took me a minute or so before i finally got up and turned around enough to see exactly where the dog was looking.  just north and west of where i was, visible over a row of pine trees next to my yard, a craft was hovering.  it had a large light lit, in appearance like a led but casting no light.  as soon as i looked at the craft the large light which was pointed down at me moved smoothly and quickly up to the front of the craft and the craft began to move in a south southwesterly direction.  i stood watching it, noting the lights around it and the very dimly lit red lights that appeared to be in a random pattern nearly covering the bottom of the craft.  it flew behind a group of fruit trees which blocked my further view of it while i stood, repeating, "there's no strobe...  there's no strobe..."  i was so stunned i didn't think to walk past the trees to see where it went.  

one week later, as i was walking the mile and a half across the desert east of me to get to the truck stop to see some friends, the same craft appeared just south of me a ways and at about the same altitude as the first time i saw it.  the large light on the craft did the same movement from pointed toward me to facing forward on the north facing side of the craft.  it then began to move in the same south southwesterly direction as it had the week before only this time i was able to see it go off into the far distance where it did the same series of movements as the one near las cruces had in 2007-to theleft, to the right, and gone!  

though i was often outside watching the sky after that, i saw nothing unusual.  then on june 16th, 2009, while looking east when the sun was beginning to go down, a large light very high in the sky just a bit due east of me caught my eye.  i looked up thinking at first, "what star is that," then immediately  was thinking it was too bright for a star and had to be a planet when i got sight of it.  jupiter was in the sky then, close to the east horizon so i knew it wasn't jupiter.  when i looked at it, the craft nearly immediately began to shrink until it was a very tiny light which moved south for a second before shrinking out of sight.  

on the 20th the same craft flashed in the sky just north of me as i lay watching the sky just outside the trailer where i live.  a friend i'd told about the first sighting told me to be certain to wave.  that afternoon, about sunset again, i remembered to wave.  just after i did the craft did that single flash.  

following that a number of sightings began, nearly all of which i have recorded in a notebook.  early on i missed writing about a few of them, i was so uncertain of what i was seeing that i didn't commit to recording the sighting.  that's really okay for me, personally, as i remember each one but just don't know the exact date.  i could tell you about each one still in good detail.    

since that time i have seen them more than four thousand times.  the number of craft i see varies.  there have been nights when i didn't see anything, though the skies were clouded over on those occasions.  i have seen them on cloudy evenings.  sometimes they would appear in a break in the clouds and, in the early days, those were the occasions when they would be low and/or close.  i write them down each evening after i see them.  on a clear night, i've seen as few as one (though not but a rare occasion just one) and as many as twenty-two.  i also go out in the morning as often as i can do it (much more often now than in the winter, that's for sure!) as i see them fly in the morning when i'm out there.  since these sightings started i have only missed three days in a row one time (just too cold) and only missed two days in a row twice (sick with the flu).  i'm out every night, all year, if i can be.    

there was a period i wasn't writing them down each time as i went up the mountains near here where it's much darker than where i am, though it's certainly dark enough here to see a lot.    up to that time i'd recored 2399 sightings.  up at spring canyon, in the florida mountains near here, i saw very, very tiny flashes that proved to me that the tiny flashes i often saw, and which i thought my mind was inventing somehow, were flashes from who i now call 'my friends.'  after two months i started writing them down again as there seemed to be fewer of them to write about when i wasn't writing each one down.    

sometimes the flashes are very bright and sometimes very dim and between the brightest one and the dimmest one has been just about every different brightness and intensity in between.  

when they fly over-which is many, many of them-they range from very bright to very, very tiny.  i am thankfully able to see them when they are very nearly not even there.  on some occasions i thought i was seeing the atmosphere they were displacing around them rather than the craft itself.  in almost all those cases they made themselves visible enough that i could be certain there was something there.  on the rarest occasion i'm left to ponder but that is part of the beauty of this, it is never the same from one time to the next.

sometimes they light up just briefly when they're flying and sometimes they light up and go dark again in a stationary position.  some light up and dim down across the sky, some light up and dim down and add flashes and some are lit and have flashes.  the variety is lots of fun.

often i see the same craft again!  i know a number of them by what they do and how they do it.  i have named them f (for friend) 1, f2, f3, f5, f7, 9 ,11, and 15.  there are more than that i see more than one time but i stopped naming them because i might see them tonight and not seem them again for a while.  some fly for days and days in succession then not again for a long time.  i consider it my duty to be the observer though i do sometimes miss seeing a particular craft fly by and, often enough, it soon does fly by again.  

i have watched ufo hunters and ancient aliens until i know the whole show i'm seeing again and did send an email to ufo hunters (which soon was cancelled) and to one of the people who often appears on ancient aliens.  since seti is fairly close i wrote them but got their standard response indicating that my experience is impossible because all creation is limited to seti's best guess of what's possible.  i have come to believe that seti's "wow" message was the pilots of these craft pretty much thumbing their noses at them.  

i have had some information from casual conversation that others have seen the show in the sky here.  thank goodness!  i often wondered if anyone ever looked up!  and some of the opposition i've encountered has been because i say these craft are flying for me.  but they are.  if i go thirty miles east to a parking area on i-10 at the 111 mile marker, they fly there.  if i go 30 miles west to the closest west bound rest area, they fly there.  both those places are in locations far from area lights (the parking area has no lights) so the view is good there.  i have other experiences that were certainly for me-daytime sightings and two times evidence they were on the ground-so that i no longer try hard to convince people to come watch with me.  i ask them to come here because i see them all so i can show them, too.  sometimes i'll be looking the wrong way and a very small craft will flash a tiny flash just big enough to catch my eye so that i don't miss it.  

my feeling is they're some nice beings.  i speak to them often because i'm sure they can hear me.  there have been many instances when there can be no doubt they read my thoughts.  there was a period when i would look at a point in the sky and be absolutely certain i had just seen the very tail end of a light going off.  i called those 'illusions' and saw them until i was finally able to grasp that they didn't just know where i was looking, they knew where i would look next.  

i call them 'guys' and refer to each one as 'him' when writing about a craft.  unfortunately they've chosen to let me see them and i'm not smart enough to figure out what it means.  it may be possible no one could understand that.  the possiblities are fun to consider though i'm always aware that my thinking isn't binding on anybody.

hopefully you'll be able to understand the enormity that strikes me when i think of all these things going on here.  i hope someone will be exicited enough to want to see this.  i haven't met anyone here who is interested enough to continue watching with me.  i think seven people have seen some evidence though none seemed to be too impressed.  i can't see how anyone would fail to want to see this as often as possible but here it's difficult to get people to even consider it true.  

if anyone-a ufo investigator or someone just passing by-wants to see what i'm seeing, they are welcome to stop by.  it is a much better bet to call me as i rarely come to the library to use their computers.  my laptop and camera were stolen in october and with those went all my pictures of the treats they left for me on the ground and i'm very sorry about that. except that i became aware that i was spending way more time online than i ever wanted to since the dawn of the computer age, i'd replace the computer.  

i would answer questions if it were possible, if mufon can tell me how to work that out.
content.shape: Diamond,   Flash,   Oval,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Various appearances nightly for 21 months (began 6-19-2009)

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside with my friends *(names deleted--cms/sg), we were playing and then alex went to go eat, a couple minutes later so did **(name deleted--cms/sg). so we said we would hangout after we eat lunch. when i got back my parents had just gotten in from the pool in our backyard to get a drink. then we all went back to the pool, my dad was floating on a raft type object and told me and my mom to look up, so we did and right above our pool and house was a object in the shape of a circle/disc type object. the bottom of it had areas flashing a orangeish color (flames or lights) and it floated in the same spot for about 35 secondeds. my dad ran to get his camera but then in the blink of an eye the craft took off towards the heavily wooded area and was gone. the strange thing is that right when it flew off a usaf ac30(or ac130) cargo plane was flying in the oppisate direction of the object and was kinda close to it. then it was gone and the cargo plane just flew by like nothing was ever there. there was no vapor trail from the object either, just a hole in a cloud that it flew through.
we saw the object once again that night. still a bright orange color then it was gone after about 11 seconds. havent seen it since
content.summary: Floated over head then quickly went away

content.detailedDescription:
Was swimming with my son in mid-august at our apt. complex. sky was completely clear and deep blue.  i looked up to enjoy the view of the sky and saw what appeared to be a silver mylar balloon, almost directly south at about 30-40 degrees from the southern horizon. as i watched, i noticed that the object wasn't moving with the wind, or making the usual flips or spins a balloon that high up would make. it appeared to be spinning, and wasn't moving from its position for the several minutes i was watching it.  i turned to point it out to my son and several other people, then turned back to look at it and it was still in the same position. i thought to go home and get the binoculars but the apt. complex had a strict rule about kids under 14 being supervised by their parents. we stayed another 45 minutes or so, with that silver sphere still in the same place, and then went home to change.  i came back out soon after to see if the metallic sphere was still in place, but it was gone.
no strange feeling or lost time.
content.summary: Giant silver bb hanging in the sky

content.detailedDescription: It had a green light on the back and was a cigar shape. it also looked as if it had been wrecked befor it was slightly cracked and dented some what. it flew over me at about 100 feet or so. the sighting was located in the county near new buckley rd.
content.summary: It was a green cigar shaped object that looked like it had been crashed before

content.detailedDescription: Okay,this is my story.One night i was putting my daugter to bed. she wasnt even a year old at the time.I layed her down on my bed,coverd her up and walked in to my living room to watch tv.I noticed a light shining down on the tree in my back yard.So i opened up my back door and steped out to take a look.What i saw was a trianlge shaped ufo with 1 light at each point,1 larger light in the middle orange in color.The crazy thing is there was no sound coming from the ufo at all.It was just hovering over the top of the tree.Anyways,later i awoke sitting on my couch holding a burnt out cigertte.Starring at the back door.A few days later,i started have these bad dreams,they were so bad i was afraid to fall asleep. in these dreams i see aliens.The aliens that i saw did not look like the aliens that are in the movies.These aliens are tall,with dark colored lizard like skin.Long slinder hands and fingers.I can recall in my dreams hearing them make noises almost like they were talking.A few days after the dreams started i went to the hospital for pan in my head and back.The doctors didnt know what was wrong with me but they said my brain was swollen.I stayed there for a week.Doctors released me when i was better,but with know answers as to what had caused me to fall ill.I link it to what i saw and possible alien abduction.After it first happened i tryed to tell people,but you can guess there reaction to my story.Now i just try to live with it because it doesn't look like i will ever find the answer to what happend or why for that matter.Alot has changed as to my views on life.I still beleve in my religon,but i also know for my self that we are not alone.I still have alot of question that will probably never be answered,as to why me,for what reason.
content.summary: Triangle dark in color,1 light at each point ,1 larger light in the middle,orange in color.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to my patio and looked up at the sky and noticed an object in the sky. i called my wife to look at it and she also thought it looked strange. i tried to take vidoe on my iphone but i had it in camera mode so i was able to take a quick picture before my battery died. i went inside and grabbed my camera and filmed 16 seconds before the battery died in that. so, i finally just grabbed my laptop and utilized the hd webcam to record 25 minutes of ameteur video. i will upload soon. what you are going to view is the 16 seconds plus the still picture zoomed in. 

*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo over las vegas 4/4/2011 8:30pm

content.detailedDescription:
i was working late in the evening, at home, and stepped outside for a minute.  i looked up, as i always do, to gaze at the stars.  i was facing west, and noticed three fairly bright stars, but not unordinarilly bright.  i noticed them because they formed a triangle, and one of them seemed to be moving, slowly.  i assumed it was a plane, but this light was not blinking.  i looked to the southwest and saw two other lights, heading in differing directions and blinking.  obviously planes.  i looked back to the non-blinking light and watched it for a maybe 20 seconds as the light faded and then disappeared.  i looked back to the southwest and saw the other lights (planes), still blinking.  i looked back to the west to try and locate the non-blinking light, but there was no sign of it.  i thought maybe the light was still there but just too faint to see directly, so i tried looking in the general direction of the non-blinking light, hoping to pick up something in my peripheral vision, but there was nothing.
  generally, i wouldn't think anything of the light, but the short duration of its appearance, and the abrupt disappearance seemed unusual.  it was a little exciting to see something that i would consider a ufo.
content.summary: Bright light mistaken for a star, moving slowly, dimmed, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Saw the light at first wondered if it was a helicopter, clearly saw it wasn't, stopped vehicle to watch it, it started turning to red and made a square formation then disappeared. was positive it was not something of ours as we have an airport as well as an air force base nearby and often watch their crafts. this was nothing i have seen before.
content.summary: Ball of light, moving upward, then in a square pattern, then turned red and dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: Left home at 1105 pm to see grand parents.Our dog was growling and looking up.Ilooked in same direction and saw the saucer shape object about 500 ft. it,was a side view of the ufo we could not hear any noise but our sheperd did.It slowly turned its side to us and started moving east towards the ac ,spark plug plant.It was traveling slowly ,turned south above dort highway and it gradually pick up speed then it just left our vision at highspeed.This was observed by a large crowd of people(plant employees )and, a patrol car (city) it was noted in the flint journal and the radio and tv stations talked about it and all the reports to the police were noted. it looked as it was observing the plant.Please note this craft was silver untill it got tothe plants lighted area ,it then to on the vapor light colors.It had asingle red strobe on top and white and green lights on its side.I never believed in the ufo storys untill that night but i know they  do exist..I was not drinking or doing drugs.I worked on the railroad in flint.I heard that another city north of flint saw the same craft.And during the month of january another wheel shaped object was seen by the east tywas police made those reports to the news.
content.summary: 30to40 feet across 5 to8 feet thick silver in color

content.detailedDescription: 9:30 pm monday, april 18th. 2011. over archer, florida. i was standing on my deck having a cigarette and as usual looked up at the stars. suddenly while looking south west about 40-45 degrees up, i noticed a bright neon blue light appear in the night sky. a moment later it traveled at a high rate of speed straight up until it faded out within 5 seconds. about 5 seconds later another light appeared at the same location this time a white light and appeared smaller in size, it followed the same direction as the previous blue light at the same speed and faded out after about 5-7 seconds just as the blue light did. there is not a single cloud in the sky for a light to disappear into so they must have left visible range out of earths atmosphere or simply turned off whatever was illuminating them. if they were in fact leaving earths atmosphere at that speed, the blue light must have been as large as an acre and the smaller one half an acre. *note: i was staring at the section of sky for several moments prior to seeing the orbs appear. i'm 100% convinced these were ufo's for the way they suddenly appeared, how fast they traveled and where they traveled too.
content.summary: 2 ufo's over archer, florida. one neon blue the other white. same location 5-7 seconds visual time.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i witnessed a triangular craft flying aproxamatly 150 feet off the ground. the craft was flying very low and slow and we heard a kind of low humming noise. we've lived here for 12 years and have seen many different kinds of air plains and helicopters. this vehicle was not like anything we have ever seen! we  witnessed the craft right around 9:30 pm on thursday, april 14, 2011. the craft was moving very slow, a traditional aircraft would have fallen from the sky traveling that slow.
the craft had lights on the triangular points and other lights as well. i can't stress enough how surprised we were to see this craft! i looked out the powder room window, and just across the road i saw this slow flying triangle and immediatly summoned my husband who was as shocked as i was. "oh my god what is that, what is it, what is it." is all he kept saying. please feel free to contact us if you have additional questions. we would also like to know if there were any other reports of sightings in egg harbor township, nj that evening.
thanks in advance,
*(wit's names deleted--cms/sg)
content.summary: Large triangular, low flying, craft traveling from south to north.

content.detailedDescription:
In februay 2011 i was a guest at my son's home in san antonio.  his house is located off fountainwood drive in the woodstone subdivision. at approximately 3:25 am (before sunrise of february 19th) i was awake and laying on the bed reading a real estate investment book.  i was laying on my stomach with the book propped up on the headboard and using the light on the side table next to the bed for reading.  the bedroom window was open a few inches but the blinds were shut. i heard a sound that seemed like a ping from a submarine coming from the direction of the julia semmes library.

i next hear the sound as if it were coming from fountainwood and judson streets.  then i heard the sound a minute later right outside the bedroom window. that really worried me and i wondered how this strobbing sound could get right up next to the house since there is a wood privacy fence 6 feet high next to the window that prevents anyone from entering the back yard.

when i sat up i was glad the blinds were shut and suddenly my vision was blurred by some kind of a vibrational wave that shot down into the room from the ceiling area, travelled through my body, through the bed and floor.  there was no sound with it but felt like the vibrations that would come off of a loud amplifier.  i was stunned for a few seconds and then, i do not know how this happened, but i suddenly knew that they were going to come in through the wall of the bedroom to visit me.  i began screaming, in my mind only, "don't come in, don't come in, don't come in." i was begging them to go away. i then felt that they changed their mind and i suddenly began to feel that i had been respected and they were not going to come in.  

my sense of normalcy returned, i was telling myself that i was just being silly and stop having an over active imagination and decided to sit back again with my back leaning on the head board of the bed.  i moved my feet up and bent my knees so that i could put my book on my thights and started to read again.  at this point i was facing the bedroom door to the hallway which also gives me a view of the other bedroom door in the hall.  i was the only person on this side of the house by the way.  no one else in the family woke up or heard any of this noise as they were asleep on the other side of the house.

suddenly, in my minds eye, i saw two little greys standing in the doorway of the bedroom, one was about three feet tall, the other maybe 5 inches shorter, they were holding hands so seemed non threatening.  there was another being in the doorway of the other bedroom, about five feet tall, had a wider body, and head not quite so odd shaped as the greys head shape.  no clothing or any body parts were apparent on any of the three beings.  i did not feel threatened at all by their appearance.  of course, when i wipped my head up to look with my real eyes there was nothing there.  then i head the sounds of the pinging object moving away from the house, i heard it twice before i lost the sound as it moved away.  the sound was travelling towards woodstone elementary school.  

the street my son's house is off, fountainwood street, is a fairly busy street, even at 3:30 am.  it is odd that there were absolutely no traffic sounds while this event was taking place. believe me, i was very happy to hear cars driving by again even though they had originally kept me awake that night.  i had hoped that during this experience somebody would drive by, slam on their brakes and yell something or a bunch of cars would stop to look at the object so i would not feel so alone in the experience.  it was as if all traffic had stopped moving for a few minutes.  let me say that the sound came towards my son's house diagnonally from the area of the library and departed diagonally towards the elementary school--not using roads but floating over businesses and houses.
content.summary: Ufo shooting vibrations through roof of house

content.detailedDescription:
I installed a two security camera system due to someone getting into my wifes car in feb of this year. this is a pccard system by geovision that records video to harddisk. these are the exact cameras i purchased. i needed good ir for night vision because it gets pretty dark.

http://www.2mcctv.Com/product_info-securitycameras-nightvisioninfraredbullet-2mcctv2mb52ir36l6.Html

it is a separate system from my normal every day pc. the monitor for it sits right next to mine. the first night installed was feb 20th. i had it on motion detect just adjusting the software settings. the next day i went to look at the vidoes. there was only a couple. a few cars and something else. when i played the last video i saw a bright object zig zagging. when i first saw it i wasn't sure what to make of it. i assumed it was a bug or someone with a laser pen. i ruled a bug out because these are infrared cameras. the bugs i see whiz by but really arent that bright. some are slow and you can see them flapping their wings. as far as a lazer pen i haven't tested this. the cameras at night however are pretty much invisible from the street. this video is the one labled event20110220. 

just last night i was sitting on my pc with the security monitor on and it flashed brightly. it made me jump. after reviewing the video i was shocked. not sure what this is but slowing it down frame by frame it seems to change shape. this video is called smooth orb and has the date and time stamped in the video. 

i plan to install 2 more cameras to see if i can catch more of these.

thanks,

*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Security camera showing strange objects

content.detailedDescription: I was laying down on the driveway with my scotty dog at a friend's house about 3 miles west of downtown los angeles. under a shade tree, i had an unobstructed view of a cloudless sky looking towards the east, north, & south. i started observing what i thought was a reddish-orange colored metalic balloon floating in the sky,very faint, traveling slowly from south to north.  i then noticed there were two of them, one following the other going south to north. both were starlight brightness intensity & size during the day. they continued following another, then slowed down basicially directly above me, stopped, then the one to the south pivoted 360 degrees around the stationary one to it's north,then they started heading south from where i first saw them. once they disappeared to the south, i noticed a third white object directly to the east, which looked like a star since it was uncolored. it moved very slowly to the south. while looking at this object, i then saw a white passenger plane above me to the east of me heading east after it took off from lax & made the loop over the ocean. a few seconds later i saw one of the red-orange lights fly across the sky towards the plane, going as fast as the plane. they crossed paths and kept going in their respective directions. the sphere crossed the plane at about 30 degrees. the plane was going directly east and the sphere was going in a northeast direction. i was more curious about what i was watching as i really had to concentrate on their locations as they were very small and i assume very far away from me. i stopped watching them as they eventually got too faint to see as they were approaching the horizon,being hidden by trees & buildings. i was never afraid of what i was seeing, just curious. the feeling of seeing this was far different from what i saw on nov. 14, 2008 when i saw a triangular group of lights & reported that to mufon as well. that object was much bigger, at night, & more frightening. what's going on?
content.summary: Two reddish-orange sphere & one white sphere all star sized

content.detailedDescription:
My phone rings and it is my 20 year old son who was about 2 miles from home at a friends home. he next asks me if i heard that plane? i quickly moved outside and continued the conversation and told him there were no jet sounds at my location. his description was that of 2 low flying military jets hitting their afterburners above the residential homes. the jets shook the foundations and rattled the window frames forcing the occupants to step outside to see if a plane was in distress. he then described over the phone only hearing the jets and never physically seeing them. what he did see was an erratic fast moving star sized object one half to one mile altitude making no sound as if it had escaped the jets and continued it's evasive darting and circling flight pattern over the the herndon/sterling area. the jets flew within the vicinity for a second pass, but at this point nowhere  near the strobe flashing object.

his description of the object was a fast 3 pulse strobe of blue/white light followed by a quick single flash then returning to the 3 pulse strobe. the movement was extremely fast with quick turns and circles. the object was out of sight quickly as it is a residential neighborhood with a limited range of low altitude vision. the object was definitely outrunning and eluding the military craft. they wanted it and had no chance whatsoever do to the speed and maneuverability of this object. this object owned the sky!

this area is a no fly zone for small general aircraft as we are 20 miles west of washington dc and as mentioned the final approach for dulles airport. any military jet traffic is only for intervention and policing of this no fly zone. the low altitude of the jets scrambling in this vicinity would definitely be monitored by dulles faa authorities and force a change or alteration of incoming commercial air traffic.

being an almost daily mufon reader i believed my son's sighting was worthy of reporting.
content.summary: Blue white flashing strobelike object chased by low flying military jets

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were outside in front of our house 
and we saw a bright red light coming from the west. we thought is was a jet but it was moving faster than anything we have ever seen.

it was not very high at all. 

when it got closer the arching light was big multi colored and bright
it slowed down and vanished into nothing,after about a second or two it appeared again for about two to three seconds then was gone. this was so amazing but scary.

i called the news 10 desk and the girl that answered was not very interested.She did say that she had calls from lakeside,santee and el cajon. 

i have never seen anyting like this in my life.
did anyone get video? if so please post it on you tube.
regards,
content.summary: Bright red with a bright multi color arching lights

content.detailedDescription:
I saw this object on three separate occasions.  once in july 2008, once in august 2008, and once in september 2008.  a personal friend witnessed the first event from her home about two miles from my home.  my wife witnessed the second event with me in august 2008, and again in september 2008.  the first event the object flew low and slow coming from the northwest, low arc over the lewiston hill turning northeast.  event lasted about four minutes.

the second event occurred at dusk flying low and slow right over our house.  again, no noise and no flashing lights.  the event lasted about two to three minutes.  the third event occurred at 6:30 pm plenty of evening sun light.  the disk was flying west to east, low and slow, no noise.  event lasted about two minutes. this third event was witnessed by four other family members.
content.summary: Orange disk flying west to east at low altitude, no noise, no lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Ball of bright strobe-like flashing blue/white light in a sphere shape.  three of us were driving along and all of a sudden off to the left in the sky was a bunch of flashing light, like strobe lights on a plane but flashing in a strange pattern (quick succession of lights then pauses then again���almost like random lightning flashes, but still repeating)    

it was 10:33 pm (04-08-11) and we were eastbound on hwy 30, 10 miles west of cedar rapids, iowa.  it was not foggy, but the cloud cover was low, maybe 300 to 500 ft. my friend, who was driving, saw this sphere of flashing light come down out of the overcast sky.   i would say it was 300 to 500 feet up and 500 feet to the left��� the shape was probably 30 to 40 feet in diameter, with lights flashing all over inside the sphere shape.

when i first saw it, from the backseat, i though it was lightning flashes or an airplane with strobe lights flashing.  but it was not lightning and it was not moving like an air plane and it had so many flashing strobes contained in a ball or sphere shape...
 
the light flashes were bright and a blue-ish color (not white and not quite the color of lightning).  all these pulses of light seemed contained in a round or ball like shape.  the individual flashes of light were coming from all areas inside this ball.  it was not just like 1, 2, or 3 light bulbs flashing ���it was many more, and it created this round shape in the sky at the bottom of the cloud cover.  you could see the round shape, but could not see a structure, just light and the glow of the light created a glowing circle (with the quick pluses of lights flashing inside the sphere).  it was not moving, just hovering as we drove down the highway.

we turned around about a quarter mile down the road to track back.  we were driving on a divided highway could not get turned around sooner.  i watched out the back window and just as we were turning around the lights either faded out or they went up into the clouds.

i really don���t know what to think...It happened so fast, but three of us all saw the same thing and agreed that we didn���t have any ideas as to what that could have been....
content.summary: Ball of bright strobe-like flashing blue/white light in a sphere shape.  came down of the low cloud cover, flashing bright lights inside sphere, long pattern of quick light flashes, seemed random, but was not...

content.detailedDescription: Sorry forgot to attach picture
content.summary: Picture to go with my last report forgot to attach.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home i saw this and stopped. i had a feeling to just look up and when i did they were there. they just hoovered and never moved. i took a picture. there are two objects. they are both close to the trees in the picture to the left. if you zoom in they look really interesting. then when i got home there was one hoovering over my house with a red ring of lights around it. i tried to get a picture of this but it evaportated into the clouds. no kidding it disappeared like in the movies. they were not planes. planes move. i have never really given stock all of this stuff, but i am slowly changing my mind and after this i am really changing my mind. i am excited since maybe now i can decided if i really believe or not. leaning more towards time travelers then little green men.
content.summary: The object just hoovered and never moved. very strange just sat could not have been a plain.

content.detailedDescription:
While returning home from meeting with friends for breakfast my girlfriend and i were traveling east down baseline rd. in tempe arizona at about 10:00 am and i noticed a contrail being made that seemed to go straight up, we watched for a while and it did not seem to be an optical illusion (i am a land surveyor and my eye for angles and distance is notable. neither of us could see what what was making it. i asked my girlfriend to take some pictures with my droid and the last couple she took without looking through the windshield.
the contrail just seemed to continue straight up as we observed while driving east. after a few minutes we had to turn south and get on the freeway and by the time we were able to stop and look again it was out of sight and the contrail has dissipated. i have more pictures if it would help show the trajectory.
content.summary: Vertical contrail seen from tempe arizona

content.detailedDescription: Moving west to east above route 66 in azusa, ca. it passed the big dipper and took less than a second and a half to cross it. the 3 lights were dimmer then the big dipper stars and moved in a straight line towards the east. no sound. slightly hazy sky. a plane crossed the path a couple of minutes later but you could see it was a plane and you could hear the plane. after the plane passed you could no longer see the front light but the ufo passed and was in the distance and you could still see the 3 lights clearly. i do not recall anything between the 3 objects. it may not have been solid. my wife confirmed that. the lights to her were roundish triagle shaped objects. she first thought they were birds then saw they were not she told me and i looked up and saw the lights passing the big dipper. i stood up and follwed the objects and walked along my footpath. but the lights were so fast they glided by quickly. no sound at all. the plane that passed by a couple of minutes later was loud and it appeared to be at approximatley the same level as the 3 lights. the 3 lighted triagle size was able to fit between the two stars that make up the big dippers spoon top and beginning of the handle. it glided smoothly. it was not a delta winged stealth bomber. i have seen that shape and it was not the same. to me it weas almost a crooked triagle shape. the light that was on the north end appeared to be a little off like a plane looks when it is turning. noted by  another plane turning later that night. >>> afterwards we kept looking and saw lights in the sky above the foothils. above the "a" in the azusa, ca. mountains just south of the san gabriel river, above the firestation. the lights were behind the mountains or on top. as we watched my wife saw thee lights swirling around "as if they were playing". i saw 2 very dim lights start to go up. as they continued to climbed one came out of the west and swirled around birdlike but fast maybe a hundred feet above foothill bl. and my apartment. right where the old foothil drive in marqee still stands. we have both seen a lot of strange lights in the foothilss here and glendora, ca., irwindale, ca. i think this area could use a camera pointing at a couple of spots in the hills. also, in sept. of i thnk 2005 we saw a triagle pass over the miller beer factory. and a light above glecdora, ca with fiber optic lights coming out of it shooting lighted balls out of it. scared my wife and made her a believer in ufo and strange things she can not explain. she never beleived me until then and now she looks a lot up into the stars. we were trying to see the lights from the rocket from vandenbeurg airforce base but my wife did not know wichw way to look so we were looking north and up. not south like we should have been .We were looking in the wrong place but it turned out to be the very best and right place to look. she doesn't want to tell anybody because people will think she is crazy. i think i am crazy already and will tell everybocy. so what. what i see is what i see and i do not care who believes me. i wanted to say something because tyhe last two really good sightings i had. werenot given to mufon. i finally found out you guys do sightins reports and now i will be informing you the day after or if on the week end the day i come back to work. i saw a ball in los angeles 1996, followed by a heuy two proped helicopter and know that the balls are at least 3 3 1/2 feet waide. i saw the  army army gut with his machine gun looking at me while i looked at me back. different story but i have been waiting to say my piece. also one story in glendora, ca 2006 with 8 balls of light that looke dlike ballons at firts, then birds flying in formation then forming a stright line, half moon and zooming away trunign and flying east above the foothils. enough for now. we have drawnings of what we saw last night.
content.summary: 3 lights in triagle shape

content.detailedDescription: On april 13th, around 2 am (which technically is the early morning of the 14th) i was awakened by the sound of military jets flying over my home. i live right on the arlington/falls church border, about 10 minutes from dc and the pentagon, so i am very familiar with the sound differences between commercial and military planes. i looked out the window and saw a bluish/white light flash, several times, in different positions each time. it was a cloudy night and each time the light flashed, it lit up the cloud cover near it. i heard the jets clearly, as they were quite loud, but did not see them, probably due to the cloud cover. i have never seen an object flash the way this one had, or move positions so quickly (and none of the positions were linear). i do believe there was a ufo over the skys of falls church that night, and military jets where deployed to intercept.
content.summary: Military jet planes going after a bluish/white light

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were taking a walk and left the house a few minutes past nine pm pst. i shot a short video (32 sec) on my cell that is time stamped "04/14/2011 09:27pm" we were watching the activity for about a minute and a half or two minutes before i began shooting. the footage does not reveal anything, but it recorded my wife and i talking about what we were seeing and it marked the time. twenty minutes later we saw two more ufos.

we were just taking a stroll around the neighborhood. we turned a corner and were facing west. before us at this point was about five miles of open land then there was the outline of the foothills spreading north and south. it is very dark where we were and we stopped to look at the starry sky. high in the sky at about "one o'clock" my wife and i saw a bright white light moving very quickily toward the south. it was first a fast moving ball of light then a "contrail" appeared on the end of it. it wasn't a contrail, but a long trailing light like a rocket shooting up into space, but this was going north to south and there was no smoke. the contrail appeared only a few seconds.   then the light appread to angle down and turn toward us (we were facing west).

as it headed north-east (it was veering to our left) angling downward (but not steeply) it flared up and a fan of light radiated out from the front and trailed behind. it was even all the way around and trailed off like a mist of light.  we could see the main white light inside this fountain of light that shot out the "front". then the fan of light faded, leaving just the ball of light which then disppeared as well. we scanned the sky and the white light appeard again about five seconds later, but it was bigger and closer (but still very far away). this then disappeared and reappeared very quickly even closer and lower. the ball of light then radiated a fountain of light again, but it was red and the white ball inside was now red. this red fan or fountain of light seemed to hover for what seemed a long time, but it was maybe a good 3 or four seconds. the fountain ended, leaving only the ball of now red light and the thing then veered upward and disappeared.

we live near an air force base and know the sounds of jets and helicopters. about two minutes after the light disappeared a military jet flew from north to south before us and hightailed it in the same direction as the ball of light. we know a military jet from a passenger jet. this military jet zoomed across our field of vision and went after the red ball of light.

about twenty minutes later we saw two more ufos high in the sky straight ahead of us. the second video we took is only 16 sec and is time stamped "04/14/2011 09:50pm"  cheap cell vid is only good for time and our comments.

straight ahead of us and almost centered over the foothills was a bright star that was there during the above episode. twenty minutes after the above and we were still watching the sky when we both saw a tiny ball of light come out of the "star". the tiny white light came out on the northside of the star and did a backward 'c' move and stationed itself above the star. it hovered for 5 or 6 seconds and zipped up and to the north. at the same time the star moved and went in a straight line to the south. it just began moving southward. this "star" was right in front of us during the whole thing and slowy moved in a straight line to the south and disappeared really fast after it begn moving.

we kept looking at the sky for another twenty minutes. saw many military helicopters moving in the sky before us, but no more ufo sightings at this point.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three ufos  sighted over san jacinto riverside.

content.detailedDescription:
Late last night (on or about 3:08 a.M., 04/14/11) i stepped outside for a smoke. all of a sudden i heard an increasing in volume thunderous roar, approaching from the north-west. this made me look up. it sounded like military jet with the pilots really pushing the pedal to the metal. i did not see the jets, but it sounded like the ones i saw flying over andrews airforce base in maryland. commercial jets do not sound anything like that and fly much higher. (i see a lot of them, since i live about 15 minutes away from dulles international airport). these jets seemed to be flying pretty low and i have never seen or heard them flying over at this time of night - never. i looked up to see what is making all that noise, but did not see the jets.
 
however, panning the skies from west to south, i saw what looked like a very bright large star, crossing the sky from west to south in the south-western quadrant of the sky. it had the same bluish-white tint to it that the stars do. the line of sight was at about 30 degrees angle to the ground. i could not judge the distance and did not see any shape that might have been associated with the object, but it crossed the sky in under 10 seconds and disappeared behind the trees i have to the south of my house. the strangest thing about the object was that it was blinking in a very peculiar manner. commercial jets have red and green light, blinking continuously without interruption. this thing was bluish-white, would blink 3 times within approximately 1 second, then would stop blinking all together for a second, then blink 3 times within approximately 1 second again, then stop blinking for a second, etc., during the whole 10 seconds or so it took it to cross the visible to me south west quadrant of the sky. these was no noise at all coming from the ufo directing - the roar i heard was rapidly approaching from the north - west. as i said before, the ufo disappeared behind the trees in about 10 seconds, but i kept hearing the roar for another 5 minutes or so. sounded like the jets kept flying around. then everything went silent. half an hour later the roar came back, but i was already in bed and did not run outside to see what was going on. it would not do any good anyhow, since the speed with which the object moves - it would have been gone by the time i got out.   
 
i came to work and had to tell someone what i saw. i told the story to a security guard that i am friendly with and he said that he lives right near andrews airforce base and he heard they scrambled jets several times last night, which, according to him, they never do at night. he thought someone might have flown into washington dc no-fly zone or something. this confirms my suspicions that the roar i heard was military jets. the object could not have been a satellite. i have seen those and they do not blink, do not fly at 30 degrees angle above the horizon and do not get chased by the military jets because the jets cannot fly that high.
content.summary: Blinking bluish-white star-like object chased by military jets from andrews airforce base

content.detailedDescription: My wife (a research co-ordinator for human studies) and i were having a pick nick on a dune above a crescent beach at westport washington immedeatly south of the greys harbor jetty. i noticed an object in the sky that was traveling south paralel to the coast. i remarked to my wife that there was an airliner flying by. as i continued to observe it i realised that there was no contrail in spite of my estimate of fifteen miles and about thirty thousand feet. that made me watch it more closely whereupon i realised that it was not the typical cigar shape of an airliner. indeed, it was a sphere. it shined in the clear blue sky as polished aluminum with the sun at a not severe angle forelighting it. then, it stopped appearing. gone, period.
content.summary: Aluminum shine sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the end of a 4th of july extravaganza on the tacoma waterfront. i was guest of a band that played for the freedom fest (tacoma is a military town). as all were packing up and the crowd was begining to disperse, my eye was drawn to the sky. it was anomolous that a bright light would still remain long after the fire works display. i did not connect it to my early teen's sighting that i have just reported to you because of the time/memory thing. i did point it out to adjacent bystanders. i could interest none of them in the spectacle... a silent ring of many lights that first hovered-again at approx 200ft-it then began to move northeast along the shoreline towards point defiance. there was about five minutes of time before it rounded the point, turned south and disappeared around the bluff at the point and presumably went south through the narrows. 
as a pilot i have flown in and out of the narrows airport many times. i know the airspace parameters and layers. the object was at all times-when in my sight-below the tacoma narrows airspace and therfore presumably below their radar.
content.summary: Circle of lights as from my report of 1960's

content.detailedDescription: There was a disturbance from normal. i say that because the object made no noise. i was fourteen or so and my family lived on the top floor of a duplex. we had a balcony that overlooked the street and gave us a good view of the sky. perhaps it was the light that drew me out to the balcony. i really cannot say. when i looked to the sky, i saw a ring of lights. the object moved as slowly as a helicopter might have yet made no sound. i say "the lights" because it was not a solid ring. there were many individual lights that comprised the ring. the diameter of the ring was not large. as well, it was at the most, some 200ft above us.  most of the streets residents came out as well. there were perhaps 20 persons. it traveled slowly from north to south and then disapeared over the low horizon. the next day no one would speak of it.
content.summary: Many people on our street came as if beconed.
